message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be extremely valuable to you. I'm offering it to you at a special price, recognizing the potential it holds for your business. While I can't disclose the specifics of the product just yet, I assure you it's worth at least $800000.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.  This is a significant opportunity for you to gain a competitive advantage.  Let me know your thoughts!
